# Thunderclap (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (an iron bell)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. +10 ft./level)

**Area:** 5-ft./level-radius spread

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** See text

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Magic of Faerun (Wotc), pg. 98

You create a loud noise equivalent to a peal of thunder and its accompanying shock wave. The spell has three effects. First, all creatures in the area must make Will saves to avoid being [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round. Second, the creatures must make Fortitude saves or be [[Deafened|deafened]] for 1 minute. Third, they must make Reflex saves or fall prone.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:*  Name changed from* great thunderclap* to *thunderclap* for continuity.
